statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -6 \\ 3 \\ 3 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 2 \\ -1 \\ -4 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 16 \\ -8 \\ -5 \\ 14 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 2 \\ -4 \\ 2 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ 1 \\ -4 \\ -9 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -6 \\ 3 \\ 3 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 2 \\ -1 \\ -4 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 16 \\ -8 \\ -5 \\ 14 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 2 \\ -4 \\ 2 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ 1 \\ -4 \\ -9 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
